article_title: Networks Refused Prime-Time Slot for President's Obamacare Speech
article_text:
Around The Web

Take a Look

You May Also Like

A viral video of a West Point cadet apparently texting on her cellphone while marching in formation at graduation on Sat . . .

A Maine high school is demanding Gov. Paul LePage apologize for fabricating a story about a drug-addicted student overdo . . .

Bill Cosby was ordered Tuesday to stand trial on sexual assault charges after a hearing that hinged on a decade-old poli . . .

og.description: The White House asked major TV networks for a prime-time slot for President Barack Obama's Tuesday speech proclaiming Obamacare had reached its 7.1 million enrollment milestone, but network officials rebuffed the request.
